doc:
Ian Michael Smith https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ian_Michael_Smith 0 Ian Michael Smith (born May 5, 1987) is an American actor, known for his starring role in Simon Birch.His short physical stature (3 ft 1 in (0.94 m)) is a result of Morquio syndrome, a rare enzymatic disorder affecting the circulatory, muscular and skeletal systems. Ian_Michael_Smith ( born May_5_,_1987 ) is an_American_actor , known for his_starring_role in Simon_Birch.His_short_physical_stature ( 3_ft_1 in ( 0.94_m ) ) is a_result of Morquio_syndrome , a_rare_enzymatic_disorder affecting the_circulatory_,_muscular_and_skeletal_systems .
